overview:
Phillip Yang is an internet and tech entrepreneur and works out of IPPLEX spearheading product and business development on IPPLEX owned properties. IPPLEX was sold and acquired by a private investor in the middle of 2010 and is now helping to align IPPLEX into new areas of growth and products.

Prior to joining IPPLEX, he was at Bestcovery.com in early 2008 serving as their content and product manager in charge of community recruitment and product development. Joining Bestcovery.com in early 2008 was Phillipâ€™s first foray into the web and by the end of December in 2010, Bestcovery was serving over 7 figures in visits before jumping into IPPLEX.

As a consultant in the technology and internet field, Phillip specializes in the application of machine-vision/computer vision products that touch commerce, social, games, and accessibility markets. He also specializes in the video chat space with his background in iVisit and other enterprise applications in health-care.

Since graduating from USC, he keeps in touch with his alma-mater by volunteering his time with his regional alumni clubs. He served several roles within his alumni club supporting and raising awareness for USC, creating and executing on fundraising events for USC scholarship.
